channel.title: Pimpscape help lowering black/white armor
channel.description: well i added a little to much admins on my server and they used ::armor to get black and white and they always die and the black and white on the floor and the other pickup it continues lol.. so my server has so much players with lots of white/ armor 1 hitting everytime can anyone tell me how to lower the bonases on black and white armor on pimpscape[br][size=1]Posted at: November 20, 2006, 12:00:03 AM[/size][hr].

item.title: Pimpscape help lowering black/white armor

yeh then save but do not delete any thing just replace the stats

item.title: Pimpscape help lowering black/white armor
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

open up ur item.cfg and look for the armour then go across to u see the stats of the armour should be 4 lot of numbers then change that to what u want it to be n go across more and change all those.

Repeat for all armour and weps

Read full topic
